mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE as studyCode , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_NAME as studyName , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_TOPIC as studyTopic , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_LIMIT as studyLimit , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_AREA as studyArea , ( SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_INFO.USER_CODE = STUDY_INFO.STUDY_RGSTUS_ID ) as userName , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_IN_STUDY WHERE USER_IN_STUDY.STUDY_CODE = STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE) as totalCount FROM STUDY_INFO WHERE STUDY_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT TITLE as title , START_DT as startDt , START_HM as startHm , END_DT as endDt , END_HM as endHm , TYPE as type , CONTENT as content , STUDY_CODE as studyCode , CALENDAR_CODE as calendarCode , (SELECT STUDY_NAME FROM STUDY_INFO WHERE STUDY_CODE = CALENDAR.STUDY_CODE) as studyName , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_CODE = CALENDAR.RGSTUS_ID) as rgstusId FROM CALENDAR WHERE STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND ((START_DT >= #{searchMonthFrom} AND START_DT <= #{searchMonthTo}) OR (END_DT >= #{searchMonthFrom} AND END_DT <= #{searchMonthTo}))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM , main.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ ordered use_nl(sn) INDEX_DESC(sn STUDYNOTICE_IDX) */ sn.NOTICE_CODE as studyNoticeCode , sn.NOTICE_TITLE as studyNoticeTitle , (SELECT ui.USER_ID FROM USER_INFO ui WHERE ui.USER_CODE = sn.RGSTUS_ID) as studyNoticeRgstusId , (SELECT si.STUDY_NAME FROM STUDY_INFO si WHERE si.STUDY_CODE = sn.STUDY_CODE) as studyNoticeStudyName , TO_CHAR(sn.RGDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as studyNoticeTime , sn.NOTICE_CNT as studyNoticeCount FROM STUDY_NOTICE sn WHERE sn.USE_YN = 'Y' AND sn.STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT us.STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY us WHERE us.USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND us.USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) main WHERE ROWNUM <= #{last} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{first}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY_NOTICE WHERE STUDY_NOTICE.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_CODE as studyNoticeCode , STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_TITLE as studyNoticeTitle , STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_DESC as studyNoticeDesc , STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_CNT as studyNoticeCount , STUDY_NOTICE.RGDT_DT as studyNoticeTime , STUDY_NOTICE.UPDT_DT as studyNoticeUpdateTime , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_NAME as studyNoticeStudyName , (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE STUDY_NOTICE.RGSTUS_ID = USER_INFO.USER_CODE) as studyNoticeRgstusId FROM STUDY_NOTICE, STUDY_INFO WHERE STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE = STUDY_NOTICE.STUDY_CODE AND STUDY_NOTICE.NOTICE_CODE = #{studyNoticeCode} AND STUDY_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y'
